mapper.select: SELECT c.*, DATE_FORMAT(c.comm_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date, m.member_nickname FROM community c LEFT JOIN member m ON c.member_id = m.member_id ORDER BY c.comm_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply VALUES ( (SELECT * FROM (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(reply_code),0) FROM reply) A)+1, #{id}, #{content}, NOW(), #{comm_code} )
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, m.member_nickname FROM reply r LEFT JOIN member m ON r.member_id = m.member_id WHERE r.comm_code = #{comm_code}
SELECT count(*) from reply WHERE comm_code = #{comm_code}
mapper.delete: DELETE r, c FROM community c LEFT JOIN reply r ON r.comm_code = c.comm_code WHERE c.comm_code = #{comm_code}
